}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== :[http://nokiamuseum.info/nokia-d211/ ''Nokia D211'' on '''Nokia Museum'''] The Nokia D211 is a multimode radio card for compatible portable computer :that enables network access through GPRS, HSCSD or WLAN networks.
*[http://www.eettaiwan.com/ART_8800323812_675327_NT_2e1f5d7c.HTM Review on '''EET|Taiwan'''] (Spec.) :CPU: [[Texas Instruments]] 4370841 / 4370815 (SRAM) :Flash: [[STMicroelectronics]] M59MR032C 4MB (NOR) :::[[Atmel]] ATI9696 (Ð•2PROM) :RAM: [[Samsung]] K6F2016U4E 256KB (SRAM) :PMU: [[Micrel]] MIC2505BM - Power Switch (PMIC) :WLAN: 802.11b (11Mbps) :[[Intersil]] HFA3845IK - MAC :[[Intersil]] HFA3861B - BBP :[[Intersil]] HFA3783IN - QAM :[[Intersil]] ISL3685IR - RFIC :[[RFMD]] RF2163/2324A - PA
==Links of Interest== *[http://djbnetbsd.drivehq.com/PC/NetBSD/PRISM/models.html On djb's PRISM models page] <small>([https://deviwiki.com/files/archive/djnetbsd_old/PRISM%20Models.html archived here])</small> *[https://archive.org/details/nokia-d211 Driver for Windows 98SE, ME, 2000 and XP]
